channel.title: Other on Merlijn Sebrechts
channel.description: Recent content in Other on Merlijn Sebrechts

item.title: Dell EcoLoop Pro vs Premier backpack
item.description: I bought the Dell EcoLoop Pro, so you don’t have to. Dell EcoLoop Pro At the beginning of this year, I bought the Dell EcoLoop Pro Slim and regretted it immediately. The advertising for it is borderline deceptive, in my opinion. My previous experience with Dell backpacks is that they look stylish and professional, are very handy, and very durable. I’ve used my previous Dell backpack for about 6 years, and it’s still very useful, although it’s starting to look a bit dated.
